'''''Amon Hen'' 219''' is the two-hundred-and-nineteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[September]] [[2009]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen219.jpg|The Green Dragon]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Decorative artwork
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* Seminar Announcements/Call for Papers
** By: Ian Collier
* Report: Away with the Fairies
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Advertisement: American Chesterton Society
* The [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* The Bidding of the War Shaft
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Poem: ''Fell Winter''
** By: Julie Sinclair
* Similarities between [[The Lord of the Rings|LotR]] and ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_and_Peace War & Peace]''
** By: Chris Mac Arthur
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Letters
* Shire Education
** By: [[Maggie Burns]]
* Review: ''[http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b00jz2qp The Narnia Code]''
** By: Jessica Yates
* Review: ''[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Outlander_%28film%29 Outlander]''
** By: Jessica Yates
* Review: [[Lothlöryen]] [[Some Ways Back No More|CD]]
** By: Michael Cunningham
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|ITF]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards ~ Tuilinde
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]
** By: Anne Forbes
* Around the World in 80(?) Societies
** [[Spanish Tolkien Society|Sociedad Tolkien Española]]
* Artwork: ''One for the Dark Lord''
** By: Nick Basi
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
* Member Profile
** By: Jordan Stewart
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
